document_data.name: Sladis Vadir
document_data.mainbody: '''Sladis Vadir''' was a [[druid]] and a member of the [[Emerald Enclave]] during the late 15th century DR.
document_data.Personality: Sladis was always fascinated by the Underdark, but the madness spread by the [[demon lord]]s destroyed his sanity. However, it was not too late for him to be cured.
document_data.History:
Sladis was one of the students of [[Morista Malkin]] in [[Gauntlgrym]]. However, ''circa'' [[1486 DR]], he was driven mad and he disappeared into the [[Underdark]].

Driven by madness, he started to kill and eat other [[humanoid]]s he encountered until he arrived in [[Mantol-Derith]]. There, Sladis worked as a guide to [[Menzoberranzan]], [[Gracklstugh]], [[Neverlight Grove]], and [[Blingdenstone]]
